remarks: Projection Theorem with abbreviations:  A topologically closed subspace is a projection subspace.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2015.)
statement:
pjth2.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) $.
pjth2.l $e |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
pjth2.k $e |- K = ( proj ` W ) $.
pjth2 $p |- ( ( W e. CHil /\ U e. L /\ U e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> U e. dom K ) $.
